|cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 1004Kc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 880 |is_doc = |bus = 16-bit |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.6 |pwr_conn = NEMA 1-15P |serial = yes,, 4-pin header |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = MU-MIMO, 256QAM |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS_RPAC87,ASUS_RPAC87_5G |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 04/21/2017 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7615E; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 800 |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7615E; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1733 |nqam2 = 800 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|ASUS RP-AC66|ASUS RP-AC55}} ==Links of Interest== :[https://www.asus.com/News/IEo2BzJScDpbpl2L News] ===Reviews=== *[https://www.eteknix.com/asus-rp-ac87-wireless-ac2600-dual-band-repeater-review/ ''ASUS RP-AC87 Wireless AC2600 Dual-Band Repeater'' on '''Eteknix'''] *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/review-asus-rp-ac87 ''ASUS RP-AC87 Wireless AC2600 Repeater'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_rp-ac87 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt7621 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 23.05.0 |current_supported_version = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==Notes== ===GPL Info=== 
export RP-AC87 := HTTPS=y MIPS32=r2 RALINK=y MT7621=y BBEXTRAS=y 
  EBTABLES=y AUTODICT=y BUILD_NAME="RP-AC87" RPAC87=y NVRAM_64K=y 
  ODMPID=y REPEATER=y PROXYSTA=y NEW_USER_LOW_RSSI=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y 
  NEW_RGDM=y RA_SKU=y RA_SKU_IN_DRV=y MDNS=y FINDASUS=y MTK_REP=y 
  DHCP_OVERRIDE=y SSH=y QAM256_2G=y \
    ATED122=y MTK_8021X3000=y \
    TEMPROOTFS=y WPSMULTIBAND=y \
    RALINK_DFS=y \
    BOOT_FLASH_TYPE=SPI DRAM=128M \
    FIRST_IF=MT7615E SECOND_IF=MT7615E \
    CONCURRENTREPEATER=y DISABLE_NETWORKMAP=y \
    EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS="MT7621_BAUDRATE=57600 RT2880_DRAM_128M=y 
     UBOOT_CMDLINE=y MODEL_RPAC87=y RA_NAT_HW=n FIRST_IF_IPAELNA=y 
     SECOND_IF_IPAELNA=y SMART_CARRIER_SENSE_SUPPORT=y 
     MT_DFS_SUPPORT=y"
[[Category:English Documentation]]
